description: Dapr community and SDK metrics. This data gets updated twice a month.

targets.rawSql: SELECT collection_date, package_version, download_count_increment FROM nuget_dapr_client_view WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 1000
SELECT download_count, collection_date FROM python_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 1000

panels.title: Python SDK downloads (all versions, weekly average)

targets.rawSql: SELECT collection_date, download_count FROM npm_dapr_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 1000

panels.title: JavaScript SDK downloads (all versions, weekly average)

targets.rawSql: SELECT collection_date, avg_weekly_downloads FROM java_dapr_sdk_view WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 1000

panels.title: Java SDK downloads (all versions, weekly average)

targets.rawSql: SELECT collection_date, member_count FROM discord_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 500
SELECT repo_name, collection_date, fork_count_total, star_count_total FROM github_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 1000
SELECT collection_date, user_count FROM website_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 1000

SELECT repo_name, collection_date, avg_weekly_issue_count, avg_weekly_comment_count, avg_weekly_commit_count, avg_weekly_pullrequest_count, avg_weekly_distinct_user_count FROM weekly_github_counts_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 1000

panels.title: GitHub stats for all dapr repos (weekly average)

targets.rawSql: SELECT collection_date, view_count FROM youtube_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 1000

title: Dapr stats 2025
